files.README.md:
# Copia Digital â€” Claude Code Plugins

A collection of Claude Code skills and plugins maintained by [Copia Digital](https://github.com/copiadigital).

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Description |
|---|---|
| **practical-typography** | Typography guidance distilled from Butterick's Practical Typography |
| **llm-seo** | Guidance for optimising web content for LLM and AI search visibility |

## Installation

Register this repo as a marketplace, then install individual plugins:

```
/plugin marketplace add copiadigital/claude-plugins
/plugin install practical-typography@copiadigital-plugins
/plugin install llm-seo@copiadigital-plugins
```

Or use `/plugin` and browse the **Discover** tab to install interactively.
